content=Run by an English woman named Dawn. Serve a la carte or set 4 person meals . Thai and Western food.

Stay for cocktails in the late afternoon and watch the sun go down at Laem Phrom Thep.
There was a luxurious honeymoon suite, operated by the Evason Resort & Spa in Rawai, on the island. But the Evanson has closed and there is now no accommodation on the island (Nov 2013).
